# Hello there

I'm Jeffrey Schmid-Paz and I currently work as a data scientist for a retailer in Switzerland. I enjoy analyzing all kinds of data and gaining insights from them. This blog serves as place where I post data science related things I consider worth sharing.

This blog is built with the distill package in R and deployed using Netlify.

## Short Curriculum Vitae

### Professional Experience

-   Data Scientist, *Coop Genossenschaft* (10/2021-now)

-   Data Analyst, *Coop Genossenschaft* (01/2020-09/2021)

-   Junior Data Analyst, *Coop Genossenschaft* (08/2018-12/2019)

-   Before: several positions as store clerks or store assistants for *Coop Genossenschaft*, *InterDiscount*, *Lidl Schweiz*

### Education

-   Master of Science in Applied Economic Analysis, *University of Berne* (2016-2021, part-time)

-   Bachelor of Arts in Political Economics, *University of Lucerne* (2010-2015, part-time)
